thread.title: Investigators: Springfield inmate made sexual phone calls to min
thread.title_full: Investigators: Springfield inmate made sexual phone calls to min - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: Jennifer Costa
title: Investigators: Springfield inmate made sexual phone calls to min
text:
SPRINGFIELD, Vt. - Investigators say a child rapist made sexual phone calls to minors from prison.
Alex Rich, 27, is an inmate at Southern State Correctional Facility in Springfield where he is serving time for rape and lewd and lascivious conduct with children.
Now, corrections officials say Rich is under investigation again for allegedly making sexual phone calls to underage victims from behind bars. DOC intercepted a call last Thursday and reported the suspected criminal activity to authorities.
The Vermont State Police Bureau of Criminal Investigation is working the case. No word yet if Rich will face additional charges.
